title: Registration
context: [ยง481X-3] Registration. (a) Before conducting business in this State, a provider shall register with the commissioner on a form prescribed by the commissioner, and shall pay to the commissioner a fee as provided under section 431:7-101. (b) Provider registration shall be updated annually and shall contain the following information: (1) The address of the principal office of the provider; (2) The name and address of the provider&rsquo;s agent for the service of process in this State, if other than the provider; (3) The identities of the provider&rsquo;s executive officer or officers directly responsible for the provider&rsquo;s service contract business; (4) The name, address, and telephone number of any administrators designated by the provider to be responsible for the administration of service contracts in this State; (5) A copy of each service contract form the provider proposes to use in this State; and (6) A statement that the provider is in compliance with the financial responsibility requirements of section 481X-4 and that details how the provider intends to meet the requirements, and proof of compliance with the requirements.
